page.title: 07Farms North East of Ogbourne
page.content: There are five farms in the area north east of the village of Ogbourne St George. They are big farms, the biggest one is at Snap and it has 1500 acres of corn and barley as well as some more acres of grass. Farming is the main industry in our area, the main crops are barley, corn and some wheat. The farms also have dairy and beef cattle and some sheep. Our dads work on the farm. Their work is tractor driving milking and all the odd jobs that have got to be done. Today one dad's chasing rats out of the corn shed to get it ready for the harvest, another is fixing the fences that keep the cattle in.
